5.caption_en:
A concentric, consumer-centric diagram showing a central "Consumer" node surrounded by multiple colored rings and eight labeled life domains (Living, Mobility, Health, Work, Consumption, Education, Socializing, Entertainment); brand logos (Amazon, ZARA, DHL) are placed in outer rings to indicate touchpoints around the "Consumption" sector. 

{
  "type": "diagram",
  "title": "Consumer-centric concentric rings with sector labels and brand touchpoints",
  "center_label": "Consumer",
  "sectors_clockwise_from_top": [
    "Living",
    "Mobility",
    "Health",
    "Work",
    "Consumption",
    "Education",
    "Socializing",
    "Entertainment"
  ],
  "rings": [
    {
      "name": "core",
      "index": 0,
      "color": "coral/red",
      "description": "central consumer node"
    },
    {
      "name": "inner",
      "index": 1,
      "color": "dark teal",
      "description": "closest ring surrounding the consumer"
    },
    {
      "name": "middle",
      "index": 2,
      "color": "deep blue",
      "description": "middle engagement ring"
    },
    {
      "name": "outer",
      "index": 3,
      "color": "bright cyan",
      "description": "outer engagement ring"
    },
    {
      "name": "perimeter",
      "index": 4,
      "color": "light blue and grey segments",
      "description": "perimeter ring with sector labels"
    }
  ],
  "brands": [
    {
      "name": "Amazon",
      "type": "logo",
      "approximate_ring": "middle",
      "sector": "Consumption",
      "position_notes": "small shopping-cart style logo placed toward the inner/middle rings near the Consumption sector"
    },
    {
      "name": "ZARA",
      "type": "text logo",
      "approximate_ring": "outer",
      "sector": "Consumption",
      "position_notes": "text label on the bright cyan outer ring within the Consumption sector"
    },
    {
      "name": "DHL",
      "type": "logo",
      "approximate_ring": "perimeter",
      "sector": "Consumption",
      "position_notes": "DHL logo placed on the light-blue perimeter ring in the Consumption sector"
    }
  ],
  "annotations": [
    "arrows point inward from the perimeter toward the consumer and brand touchpoints",
    "sector labels appear on the outer grey band",
    "visual emphasis on Consumption sector via multiple brand placements"
  ],
  "style": "concentric rings, radial sectors, brand logos as touchpoints"
}
